name: Target Chase
description:
Take your flying to new heights! Master and unlock all cute characters and pets. Fly through the city, avoid obstacles, earn great rewards! Win amazing prizes. How long can you last?

Cross the city and see if you can beat your friends highscore in the online leaderboards!

FEATURES

­ 30 unlockable characters !!! ­ Cool prize machine. ­ Great visuals and sound. ***How to play*** Game is pretty simple ­ tap tap and tap to flight. Try to avoid obstacles and collect coins. ***

It can be pretty fun ! If you enjoyed this game in the past, today is the day to enjoy the game one more

time. This game brings you back to old times :)

Enjoy

P.S. I would greatly appreciate it if you kindly give me some feedback in your review.
